pkgmetadata.longdescription: ====================== @public and @private======================This library provides two very simple decorators that document the*publicness* of the names in your module. They keep your module's ``__all__``in sync so you don't have to.Author======``public`` is Copyright (C) 2016-2023 Barry Warsaw <barry@python.org>Licensed under the terms of the Apache License Version 2.0. See the LICENSEfile for details.Project details=============== * Project home: https://gitlab.com/warsaw/public * Report bugs at: https://gitlab.com/warsaw/public/issues * Code hosting: https://gitlab.com/warsaw/public.git * Documentation: https://public.readthedocs.io * PyPI: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/atpublic
